name: Ray Venport
description:
hello all.. i`m ray, though i`m new, i wanna explore and try new things.
hate talking about myself, like painting myself with few sentences, i`ll rather prefer you meet me face to face and then know the kind of person i am. for starter; i`m an optimistic, dedicated, hardworking, honest and easy going man…….. honesty us my best policy. I`ll rather we meet in person then you`ll know the real me in me. well. i am a gentle, honest, adventurous, hardworking and caring person. i have a son that lives with me. I just wanna meet a caring, committed and understanding woman that is ready to settle down for a serious relationship and she must be ready for adventure i.e to try new things.
